form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT, Form 1-595

full_text: Form I-535 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Bureau of Budget No. 43-R067.3. (Rev. 10-28-49) APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT NOTE.-Application for extension shall be made on this form to the district director of the immigration district in which the institution which the student is attending is located. This application shall be submitted approximately 30 days prior to the expiration of the period for which admitted or to which admission has been extended. This application must be accompanied by the applicant's passport and any visitor's permit (Form I-94) issued to him when he was admitted to the United States. The passport and permit will be returned. (PRINT OR TYPE ALL ANSWERS TO QUESTIONS) File No. (Mr.) 1. My name is (Mrs.) MAOLING LIU My age is 47 years. (Miss) 2. My place of birth is SHOU-KUAN G - HSIEN SHANTUNG CHINA (City or town) (Province) (State) 3. I am a citizen or subject of CHINA (Country) 4. My residence in the United States is 630 LINCOLN NE MPLS MINN (Street and number) (City or town) (State) 5. My foreign residence is YENCHING UNIV. PEKING CHINA (Street) (City or town) (Province) (State) relative in the United States is THELMA B. LIU WIFE 6. My reference (Name) (Relationship) permanent address 630 LINCOLN ST.N.E MPLS 13 MINN (Street and number) (City or town) (State) or 7. Passport No. 356119 , or document in lieu of passport, valid until Oct 7 1952 (Month) (Day) (Year) issued by CHINA , on OCT 7 1949 (Country) (Month) (Day) (Year) at CHINA TIENTSIN is enclosed herewith. (Country) (City or town) 8. I was admitted as a nonquota immigrant under Section 4 (e) of the Immigration Act of 1924 at (Port of SAN FRANCISCO , by 55 GENERAL GORDON on the 1st , day of entry) (Name of vessel or railroad) FEB 1947, for a temporary period of 2 yrs. 9. The serial number of my visitor's permit is 10. I have secured 3 extensions, the last extension to expire on AUG 7 1951 (Number) (Month) (Day) (Year) 11. Since admission to the United States I have attended the following schools in day classes for the period (s) stated: UNIV. OF MINN APRIL 1947 DATE (School) (From) (To) (School) (From) 3 cred. and thesis work 12. During the last semester, which ended on JUNE 15 , I carried XXXXX semester hours (or the equivalent of that amount) in day classes, and semester hours (or the equivalent of that amount) in evening or night classes. The day courses were: M&M 175 (Name the courses) AND THESIS The evening or night courses were: (Name the courses) I passed all of the said courses successfully except (Give course name and hours) Not registered I am now carrying semester hours (or the equivalent of that amount). 16-53706-2 *Certified full load
